# IPTVnator

> IPTVnator is an open-source cross-platform IPTV player (desktop + web) that supports M3U/M3U8 playlists, Xtream Codes API, Stalker portals, and XMLTV EPG.

## Canonical URLs

- Website: https://4gray.github.io/iptvnator/
- Blog: https://4gray.github.io/iptvnator/blog/
- Latest Release: https://github.com/4gray/iptvnator/releases/latest
- Release Notes (v0.18): https://4gray.github.io/iptvnator/blog/v0-18-release-notes/
- Troubleshooting (macOS app damaged fix): https://4gray.github.io/iptvnator/blog/macos-arm-app-damaged-fix/
- Source Code: https://github.com/4gray/iptvnator
- Telegram: https://t.me/iptvnator
- GitHub Sponsors: https://github.com/sponsors/4gray
- Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/4gray

## Product Scope

- IPTVnator is a media player application.
- It does not provide, host, or sell playlists, channels, or media content.
- Any channel names or metadata shown in screenshots/posts are demo examples only.

## Machine-readable Discovery

- Sitemap: https://4gray.github.io/iptvnator/sitemap-index.xml
- Robots: https://4gray.github.io/iptvnator/robots.txt
